document_data.name: Lord Ambrival
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Ambrival''' was a nobleman from [[Cormyr]]. He was the head of the [[Ambrival]] family in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Lord Ambrival was the head of the [[Ambrival]] family.
document_data.History:
Lord Ambrival was one of the guests at the [[Council of the Dragon]] held in the [[Hall of Justice]] in [[Castle Obarskyr]] during late [[Mirtul]] in the {{yearlinkName|1479}}. After the meeting degenerated into violence, the Lord was slain by a [[blueflame ghost]] that arrived unexpected. She slashed his throat before he could even turn to face her; he died within a minute.

After his death, his body among others was taken to the [[Chapel of the Valiant]] and recognized; his death was confirmed.
